Uses of Interface
it.apice.sapere.api.space.LSAspace

Packages that use LSAspace
it.apice.sapere.api.ecolaws.match This package contains the definition of SAPERE Ecolaw matching information. 
it.apice.sapere.api.space This package contains LSA-space interfaces. 
 

Uses of LSAspace in it.apice.sapere.api.ecolaws.match
 

Methods in it.apice.sapere.api.ecolaws.match that return LSAspace
 LSAspace MatchResult.getLSAspace()
           Retrieves a reference to the LSAspace that computed the match.
 

Uses of LSAspace in it.apice.sapere.api.space
 

Methods in it.apice.sapere.api.space that return LSAspace
 LSAspace LSAspace.apply(MatchingEcolaw law)
           Executes the Ecolaw, changing LSA-space current state.
 LSAspace LSAspace.clear()
           Removes all LSAs.
 LSAspace LSAspace.ignore(LSAid lsaId, LSAObserver obs)
           Stop observing the specified LSA.
 LSAspace LSAspace.inject(LSA lsa)
           Inserts in the space a new LSA.
 LSAspace LSAspace.observe(LSAid lsaId, LSAObserver obs)
           Starts observing the specified LSA.
 LSAspace LSAspace.remove(LSA lsa)
           Removes the LSA from the space.
 LSAspace LSAspace.update(LSA lsa)
           Updates the LSA in the space, which has the same LSA-id, with values from the provided one.
